text: but it's unlike any other crypto course you're likely going to see anywhere else.
It's not going to teach you how to code crypto,
it's definitely not going to teach you how to trade crypto and
make a billion dollars here and lose a billion dollars there.
This is a course about the future of crypto as a technology,
and as a mechanism that regulators are gonna have to grapple with.
In all candor, nobody knows how this story ends,
but we do know many of the serious questions that are gonna have to be asked and answered
as we grapple with the future of crypto as a technological force in our society.
and we look forward to cooperating with you in bringing you a different perspective,
a different way of thinking about the future of crypto.
